Description: Validate successful booking via /api/tickets/book with valid input (e.g., user_id, event_id, seat_number, payment_info).
Test Step Description: Open the API endpoint /api/tickets/book
Send a valid POST request with all required fields (user_id
Functionality: Request is accepted by the API

Test Step Description: Verify the API returns HTTP 201 Created
Verify the JSON response contains booking_id
Functionality: Response contains all required fields with booking_status as 'confirmed'

Description: Validate API response when required fields are missing in the POST request (e.g., missing user_id or seat_number).
Test Step Description: Open the API endpoint /api/tickets/book
Send a POST request missing user_id or seat_number
Verify API returns HTTP 400 Bad Request
Verify error message specifies missing fields
Test Step Expected Result: Error message indicates which required fields are missing

Description: Validate API response when invalid data types are provided (e.g., user_id as string instead of integer).
Test Step Description: Open the API endpoint /api/tickets/book
Send a POST request with user_id as 'abc'
Verify API returns HTTP 400 Bad Request
Verify error message specifies invalid data type
Test Step Expected Result: Error message indicates invalid data type

Description: Validate API response when booking a seat that is already booked.
Test Step Description: Open the API endpoint /api/tickets/book
Send a POST request with seat_number already booked
Verify API returns HTTP 409 Conflict
Verify error message specifies seat already booked
Test Step Expected Result: Error message indicates seat is already booked

Description: Validate API response when booking a ticket for an inactive event.
Test Step Description: Open the API endpoint /api/tickets/book
Send a POST request with event_id for inactive event
Verify API returns HTTP 404 Not Found
Verify error message specifies event not found or inactive
Test Step Expected Result: Error message indicates event is not found or inactive

Description: Validate /api/tickets/book endpoint remains stable and available after multiple booking requests.
Test Step Description: Open the API endpoint /api/tickets/book
Send multiple valid POST requests in succession
Test Step Expected Result: API should handle all requests without crashing

Test Step Description: Verify no downtime or error spikes

Description: Validate that booking data is correctly stored and retrievable after booking.
Test Step Description: Open the API endpoint /api/tickets/book
Send a valid POST request to book a ticket
Query the database for the booking_id
Test Step Expected Result: Booking data matches request and response
